body: If we do the `ref()` block as suggested above, then we don't need this but instead would use `ref.nativeHandle()` for the call to `addGradients`
body_html: If we do the ref() block as suggested above, then we don't need this but instead would use ref.nativeHandle() for the call to addGradients
